description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync E171M - 17" LED-Backlit LCD Monitor
The E171M is a 17" 5:4 conventional format monitor with latest energy saving LED backlight technology. It offers excellent connectivity with ergonomic adjustability. Low power consumption and low operating costs make the display perfect for use in the professional office environment.
